longBusinessSummary: JINS HOLDINGS Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the planning, manufacturing, sales, and import/export of eyewear and fashion accessories in Japan and internationally. It offers airframes; JINS HOME glasses; heat-resistant glasses under the JINS SAUNA name; JINS TODAY fashionable eyewear; reading glasses under the JINS READING name; JINS SCREEN computer and smartphone glasses; JINS Switch, an eyewear that uses magnet to attach sunglasses to frame; sunglasses; children's glasses; glasses that provides protection against pollen and droplets under the JINS PROTECT name; JINS VIOLET+ lenses that selectively blocks blue light and ultraviolet rays; JINS MEME, an eyewear that corrects bad posture; and contact lenses under the JINS 1DAY name through stores under the JINS Shibuya, JINS Harajuku, and rim of jins LUMINE Shinjuku names, as well through online and other channels. The company is also involved in office space planning, operation, management, and consulting; and contracting business for agriculture work. In addition, it operates bakery cafes. The company was formerly known as JINS Inc. and changed its name to JINS HOLDINGS Inc. in July 2019. JINS HOLDINGS Inc. was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Shinichiro  Matsuda
companyOfficers.title: Executive Officer of Technology Strategy Division, Digital Division, & Supply Chain Division
